hero.title: Crafting Digital Success from Scratch
hero.subtitle: Tailored Website Solutions for Every Company's Unique Vision

userPage.title: Ahrokhimpromtsentr
userPage.firstDescription: The corporate website seamlessly integrates user-friendly navigation with visually engaging design, providing visitors with an immersive experience.
userPage.secondDescription: Development process prioritized responsiveness and compatibility across devices, ensuring accessibility for a diverse audience.

adminPage.title: Admin page
adminPage.firstDescription: This special platform has been carefully designed to manage a corporate site, from product presentation to employment management.
adminPage.secondDescription: Security is a top priority, so we implemented robust authentication protocols to safeguard sensitive corporate information.

backend.title: Backend
backend.firstDescription: The backend project was meticulously developed to serve as the backbone of the application, handling data processing, logic, and ensuring functionality.
backend.secondDescription: Key features of the backend include a secure authentication system, robust data storage, and efficient API endpoints for communication with the frontend.
